text: Did someone recently run disk cleanup with Windows Update Cleanup on that server and recently finished it up with the restart? Still using WSUS here but I’ve seen previous updates detected and reinstalled at times under that scenario on WS12R2 and earlier. -Bonnie

metadata.topic: SCCM Pushing out previously installed patches to a server
